website_summaries.verdict: As close to indestructible as kids' shoes get. AND she can put them on by herself. Win-win.
pros: Generous toe protection for children who play hard
Kids can put these shoes on themselves
Can re-order tabs with different sizes to accommodate different sized feet
Designed for stability, support and comfort for young walkers
Comes in fuschia-purple, metallic silver and star dust blue
Sneakers have high burst synthetic and mesh upper
Hook-and-loop closure, pull loop at heel

customer_reviews.title: Velcro No Longer Sticks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes after my son outgrew his previous pair, which we adored and which lasted forever. Within a matter of weeks, the Velcro stopped sticking on this pair. Given the price and supposed quality of these shoes, I'm extremely disappointed. I should note that our previous pair was bought in a local shoe store. This makes me wonder if the quality is different for those being sold through Amazon. Based on our experience, I would strongly advise against buying these here.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He prefers to wear them over any of his other shoes. They are comfortable, easy to put on, and a great neutral color and go with almost any outfit. The only thing I don't like is how low the shoe sits on his foot. Whenever he takes his shoes off once he gets home, they are full of rocks, dirt, and pebbles. We live in the mountainous region of Arizona, and I'm hoping these shoes can hold up to the three times a day my child has recess at school. Other than that, I highly recommend it for everyday school and play.
customer_reviews.author: NAY J.

customer_reviews.title: No arch support BUT well-made
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are made well and we loved the idea of them BUT they are NOT for *all* kids. My son with a higher arch wasn't able to wear them... starting limping and struggling with balance. There's really no arch support...
customer_reviews.author: H_C_L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, flexible, durable, breathable kids shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, flexible, durable, breathable kids shoes. These are our second pair of Plaes and we will purchase more! My son loves the changeable tabs that can be bought on Plae's website. My son has lived in these this summer. No issues with fit or wear, although I did snip off a loose thread about 2 weeks after purchase, Nothing else has unraveled.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: ... these in the mail for my daughter and very happy with how they look
customer_reviews.text: Just received these in the mail for my daughter and very happy with how they look. Like them better once I received them then how I thought they would look. The lighter blue is actually has a metallic fleck in it and the pink and orange are more vibrant than what is shown in picture. Seem to be pretty good quality but only time will tell once she wears them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that last forever...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a very active 6 year old. Imagine the suffering and punishment this pair of shoes has endured at the feet of this child for over a year. Yet, it still fights to live another day and still looks good. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.text: These things fell apart within a month. Not sure what’s happening with Plae’s but not worth the cost anymore. They need to use better glue. On a better note, my kid loves them! Sad to see them go so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: The Glenn’s

customer_reviews.title: Will but again
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. My 2 yr old doesn't trip anymore while running even though I bought them a half size big. I was hesitant to spend that much on shoes but they are definitely worth it. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: they do get ruined pretty quickly. They look worn and its only been ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes, they do get ruined pretty quickly. They look worn and its only been 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: and easy for a 2 year old to take off and ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable, cute, and easy for a 2 year old to take off and put on.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Plae brand shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best kids shoes on the market. We love Plae brand!
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Straps too short
customer_reviews.text: Returning these. Weird issue with Velcro. The straps are no where near long enough. My toddler has average width feet and while the shoes seemed to fit fine, we could barely attach the top Velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: breview

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable but after 3 months they broke with holes on ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable but after 3 months they broke with holes on both pinkie toes area. Not worth the $$$ at all.
customer_reviews.author: Izy

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for us
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of the shoe but unfortunately it was too narrow for my son. He usually wears a wide but I decided to try it since the product description said it could usually accommodate a wide foot but it wasn't the case with us. Sadly, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana F.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has a high instep so the straps are a bit too short to reach the other side.
customer_reviews.author: yael

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the plae brand of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size, other than that. I LOVE the plae brand of shoes, they just fit my toddler perfectly and go with him on every great adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I bought her this shoes, she does not want to wear anything else. They seem durable, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and he can take them on or off soooeasily!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: He is super tough on shoes and he's gotten holes in Nike ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the only sneakers that have ever held up long enough for him to grow out of. He is super tough on shoes and he's gotten holes in Nike and New Balance sneakers within a month. These lasted over 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the kid shoes brands. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: AlmudenaTercero

customer_reviews.title: my son doesn't like this sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Calluses on the foot, my son doesn't like this sneakers. But they are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on himself
customer_reviews.text: My little guys loves them. Easy to put on himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter loves these shoes and the seller had an amazing service.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes and the seller had an amazing service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids tested, moms approve!
customer_reviews.text: My son does not wear any other shoes except Plae! Very durable and comfortable. Highly recommend this for toddlers and big kids for school and summer activities.
customer_reviews.author: JSR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great, cute shoes. Good fit and my granddaughters love them!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!! No tabs to match!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I ordered these for my son on recommendation from a friend. My son has wide feet. I thought that the longer tabs were included but they are not. I then tried to order the matching tabs and there are none. So I was going to settle for some other tabs that I don't really like instead of the matching ones for the shoes. They don't have any in the length (large) that I need. I have to say that I am very disappointed in this purchase. The shoes seem to be great quality but I will have to send thembackbci can't get tabs to match in the length I need. Great concept, poor delivery of service-product.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes for young children!
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe all around! They provide support, protection and mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a defective product. The top strap is too short.
customer_reviews.author: mgravy26

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! Love this brand!!! My little guy says they make him so fast! Very well made in obvious ways when you see them in person.
customer_reviews.author: Chelseabath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sneakers, well made, fit as expected. Wash well! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great design and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great design and comfy, but poor leather quality. We had a tear around one of the strap holders a week after purchase and about a week ago we found another tear. We were not impressed with customer service when we contacted Go Plae. Luckily Amazon was kind enough to give us an estimated refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cvetomir Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: For active toddlers, this shoe is absolutely perfect. The soles are tough and durable. I previously bought my son Tsukihoshis, and while I still lean towards Tsukihoshis for younger toddlers due to it's light weight, their soles cannot handle more than 6 months of rough older toddler / little kid play. Plae's foot support is great, the sole goes up to provide generous toe protection. Love that the tabs are replacable. And fabric is awesome. We sized up a full size, instead of the usually recommended half. No wobbliness, and can see the paid holding up well to 10ish months of daily rough and tumble.
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa Janssens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes we've found so far. Perfect for our busy 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Deering

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, my son loved them however, they are not as durable as I thought they would be. I washed them once after a couple of months of wear and the sole separated from the shoe. He has a pair of Pumas and a pair of Adidas that lasted longer and they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect to play in. My son wears them all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Waddell

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro isn't long enough to reach across the top ...
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro isn't long enough to reach across the top of the shoe. We've never had that problem with other shoes. But there's a piece of Velcro in the middle which keeps it from flapping around, but the shoe is less secure because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely live these sneakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! My 2 year old son loves running and I always go through so many shoes. So far I can tell these will definitely last. The whole bottom of the shoe is ALL grip! Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.author: tony kim

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great looking minimalist shoe. Straps are functional and easy. Most importantly my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset

customer_reviews.title: but i ordered longer ones and we are good to
customer_reviews.text: The standard straps were kinda short for my sons small narrow foot, but i ordered longer ones and we are good to go
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoes. My son wears the toes out on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes. My son wears the toes out on all his shoes but this brand. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: These work wonderful for my son with AFOs (foot braces)
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderful for my son with AFOs (foot braces). I had to purchase larger Velcro tabs from the manufacturer, but I love that the straps are replaceable! I will surely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Justoverhalfadozen

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and my daughter loves them. They've held up very well so far and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his plae sneakers. These are the only shoes of his that he neatly tucks away to make sure that he always finds them when he goes out!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! The hold up nicely for my 5 year old! Cannot wait till my 18 month old will fit into this brand of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Thiele

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist choice for toddlers and kids.
customer_reviews.text: These are minimalist shoes, designed to let kids feet do what they need to do to run, jump, and play. Wide toe box, flat, with very little support. Also easy to get on and off. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, & mother approved👍
customer_reviews.text: A great fit over my 2 year old daughter's orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Fowler

customer_reviews.title: was not super impressed with the insert/arch support seems a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: was not super impressed with the insert/arch support seems a bit cheap. We will see how they hold up?
customer_reviews.author: Mee Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes. My son had a very tall arch and no other shoes fit him this great!
customer_reviews.author: The Schusters

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: these said big boy size 6 but they are clearly little kid toddler small shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes so soft and easy to put on for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.author: Karolina Kanner

customer_reviews.title: They unfortunately were just not for our little one. ...
customer_reviews.text: They unfortunately were just not for our little one. They barely hit the velcro on top. Due to the style there is not much room for adjustment. They also let in alot of dirt in comparison to the other shoes she has. She then ended up with blisters so I gave up and bought her a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Horton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design for children feet
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd pair of PLAE shoes I get for my son. He loves them. Everybody comments on them. They fit his feet perfectly and have the right amount of room in the right places. I measured my son's foot (standing up) and used that info to order the right size.
customer_reviews.author: C. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Easy On/Off and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Plae shoes. They fit well, have enough space and aren't too wide. He also loves how he can easily put them on himself, when he's motivated to do so. Will definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: KPS at Home

customer_reviews.title: just like adults, if your kids have more than one ...
customer_reviews.text: They're made to fit kids' feet...wider in the toe box, narrower in the arch and heel. My son scrubs his shoes on the ground on the big toe when riding his bike or playground activities...it's his brake...so having the extra rubber there helps lengthen the life of the shoe. I've seen reviews where others have complained about how long the shoes last...we've not noticed that. Kids grow out of shoes so fast. And, just like adults, if your kids have more than one pair, and the shoes have a chance to dry out between wearings, then they last longer overall.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hammet

customer_reviews.title: Good lil pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good lil pair of shoes. I would buy them again. Currently trying the Tsukihoshi brand and so far so good. Both run wide and large. Order at least 1 number less than your actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick r Lerud

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy for my picky girl
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE PLAE shoes. I fell in love with these by the look and my daughter who is six and so incredibly picky about wearing shoes loves them, too. She normally complains so much about having sneakers on, but she has no issues with these shoes. Love the different color options available.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these shoes but it just appeared a little narrow for her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Charles

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stiff hard not easy to walk in had to return
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: This Plae girl sneaker tore after 6 wears. I am very disappointed and will not buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plae shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for little kids playing inside and need a pair of gym shoes that won't make the child's feet sweat. They are light and not insulated like outdoor shoes. My son usually has stinky feet cause they are always sweating and since he has been using these shoes I haven't had to deal with stinky socks and his feet don't smell, also his feet don't peel like they did before when using other tennie shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Be careful on sizing.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are ultra cute but run small. My son has average width feet, size 13. I bought size 1, and they are too small for socks! I was disappointed because they were pricey, but they are just adorable.

product_meta.title: plae Boys Ty Eco-Poly & Mesh Red/Steel Sneaker
product_meta.description: Ty – for the super active kid. Run, jump, twist, turn, flip, flop and swing: with either airy, breathable mesh or water resistant ballistic nylon to follow their lead. PLAE designs premium quality products that are fun, engaging and built for the way kids play. PLAE uses the biometric science generally reserved for elite athletes to craft a shoe that protects the natural development of children's feet.
feature_bullets: Pink/dewberry, navy/limestone, red/steel: 60% mesh, 40% eco poly
